headline: How The Kinder Morgan (KMI) Narrative Is Shifting With New Q4 Models And Price Targets
summary: Kinder Morgan’s latest valuation work points to a small shift in the story, with Fair Value edging from about US$31.76 to roughly US$32.05 per share. Recent Street research has clustered around higher price targets linked to refreshed Q4 models, so that tweak in Fair Value sits within a wider mix of optimistic and cautious analyst views. Read on to see what is really changing in the narrative and how you can keep track as the numbers and commentary evolve. Stay updated as the Fair Value for...
